messages.title: Since 2007 every home in the Lothians has benefited in some way from SNP government policies.
messages.content: We have transformed education, bolstered our health service, reformed policing, taken employment levels to a record high and built thousands of affordable homes.

messages.title: Record funding for Scotland's NHS, more staff than ever, and patients getting some of the fastest and best treatment anywhere in the UK.
Childcare increased, free school meals extended, record exam results, 607 school building projects completed, and free tuition for students.
Jobs and businesses protected through the recession - with business rates slashed or abolished for almost 100,000 employers.
COUNCIL TAX FROZEN UNTIL 2017
messages.content: For the ninth year in a row, substantial savings for every household.

messages.title: Free bus travel guaranteed for pensioners, and the most vulnerable in society protected from Tory cuts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Transformed education, childcare increased, free school meals extended, record exam results, 607 school building projects completed, and free tuition for students.
Record funding for Scotland's NHS, more staff than ever, and fast and high-quality patient treatment.
Took employment levels to a record high, protected jobs and businesses through recession and reduced business rates for almost 100,000 employers.
Built thousands of affordable homes, with financial help provided to 20,000 families to buy their homes and 30,133 affordable homes built.
Council tax frozen until 2017, resulting in substantial savings for every household.
Free bus travel for pensioners, protection of the most vulnerable from cuts.

issues.education: Transformed education with increased childcare, extended free school meals, record exam results, 607 school building projects, and free tuition for students.
issues.governance: Council tax frozen until 2017 for savings in every household. Election set for Thursday 5 May.
issues.health: Record funding for NHS, with more staff and high-quality patient treatment.
issues.socialWelfare: Free bus travel guaranteed for pensioners and the most vulnerable protected from cuts.

housing.content: Thousands of affordable homes built, financial help for 20,000 families to buy their homes, and 30,133 affordable homes built.

images.caption: Election Communication Leaflet from Scottish National Party for Lothian Constituency.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet promotes two votes for the election, one for Nicola Sturgeon as the constituency candidate and another for the party list.
